titleInfo.title: Album of Knoxville College and other missions among the Freedmen of the United Presbyterian Church

subject.topic: Presbyterian Church in the U.S.A. Board of Missions for Freedmen .
New South period and the industrialization of Tennessee .
Reconstruction and the freedmen: appearance of hitherto undocumented people in legal records; the fastening of sharecropping on the countryside.

mods.note: Map showing the Freedmen's mission stations of the United Presbyterian Church and illustrations of buildings, faculty, students, and classrooms at Knoville, and school buildings in Chase City and Forfolk, Va., Henderson, N.C., Bristol and Athens, Tenn., Camden and Miller's Ferry, Ala.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.
